application.name: lrowac2pds
application.brief: Convert from cube to PDS IMG format
application.description: Program to convert LROC WAC calibrated cube to PDS IMG formatted file, with LROC specific label, as part of the WAC CDR product pipeline.

history.change: Added a fix to allow for N-length product IDs. Fixes #1349.
Update to documentation for consistentsy and clarity. Fixes #3913.

parameter.name: FROMLIST
parameter.brief: A list of cubes to import
parameter.description: A file containing a list of PDS3 files to be imported.

parameter.name: VERSIONIDSTRING
parameter.description: The user provided version ID string, used to uniquely identifty CDR products.
